dt-api.name: owns()
dt-api.summary: Check if an element belongs to this control.

type.description: Check if an element belongs to this control.
type.returns: `true` if owned by this control, `false` otherwise.

dt-api.description: This method takes a node as a parameter and returns `true` if it belongs to this control, `false` if not. It can be useful to know this information when creating a form that has multiple click event handlers and you might need to know if a click happens inside the date picker, or elsewhere in your form.
